title: Time Travel & Skyline
subTitle: 時光交錯的城市：從昭和赤峰街到垂直天際線
intro: A journey blending the retro Showa atmosphere of Chifeng Street with the futuristic heights of Taipei 101. End the day with Michelin street food.
transportation: **MRT Red Line** + **Walking**. Taipei Fun Pass recommended.

spots.name: National Palace Museum (故宮博物院)
spots.description: Home to the world's largest collection of Chinese art treasures. Don't miss the Jadeite Cabbage and the serene Zhishan Garden.

spots.name: Chifeng Street (赤峰街)
spots.description: Once a street for blacksmiths, now a hip area filled with vintage shops and cafes. A perfect blend of old iron window grills and modern lifestyle.

spots.name: Taipei 101 Skyline 460 (台北101)
spots.description: Experience the outdoor observation deck at 460 meters. See the world's largest wind damper that protects the tower from earthquakes.

title: Tea Scent & Hidden Falls
subTitle: 自然與茶香：貓空雲端與銀河洞秘境
intro: Escape the city bustle. Hike to a temple embedded in a cliffside waterfall and sip Tie Guanyin tea overlooking the Taipei Basin.

spots.name: Yinhe Cave Waterfall (銀河洞瀑布)
spots.description: A mystical temple built into a cliff face behind a waterfall. The name 'Galaxy Cave' comes from the waterfall resembling the Milky Way.

spots.name: Maokong Tea House (貓空茶坊)
spots.description: Famous for 'Potholes' geology and Tie Guanyin tea. Enjoy a meal with a view and try tea-infused ice cream.

spots.name: Dream Plaza (信義區新地標)
spots.description: Scheduled to open in 2025. Experience the 24-hour bookstore and the vibrant nightlife of the Xinyi District.

title: 2026 New Era & Sunset
subTitle: 交通新紀元：三鶯線工藝與淡水夕陽
intro: Leverage the new Sanying MRT Line (2026) and Danjiang Bridge. A route connecting ceramics, old streets, and world-class architecture.

spots.name: Yingge Ceramics Museum (鶯歌陶瓷博物館)
spots.description: The heart of Taiwan's ceramic art. Visit the nearby New Taipei City Art Museum for a dose of modern aesthetics.

spots.name: Danjiang Bridge (淡江大橋)
spots.description: Designed by Zaha Hadid. The world's longest single-tower cable-stayed bridge, scheduled to open in May 2026. Perfect for sunset viewing.

spots.name: Shilin Night Market (士林夜市)
spots.description: Taipei's most famous night market. Try the giant fried chicken steak and oyster omelet.

title: Classic & Trendy Taipei
subTitle: 經典與潮流：大稻埕旗袍與西門町彩虹
intro: From the 1920s trading port to the vibrant youth culture hub. Experience the diversity of Taipei through qipaos and rainbows.

spots.name: Dihua Street (迪化街)
spots.description: Rent a Qipao and stroll through the historic baroque architecture. Visit the Xiahai City God Temple for blessings.

spots.name: Dadaocheng Wharf (大稻埕碼頭)
spots.description: Enjoy drinks at the container market while watching the sunset over the Tamsui River.

spots.name: Ximending Rainbow Landscape (西門町彩虹地景)
spots.description: A symbol of Taiwan's open society and LGBTQ+ rights. Shop at Don Don Donki and feel the youth energy.

title: Deep Mountain & Rail
subTitle: 深度山海戀：黃金山城與鐵道秘境
intro: For the adventurous. Hike the Teapot Mountain, explore the Sandiaoling waterfalls, and relax in the world-class Beitou hot springs.

spots.name: Teapot Mountain Trail (無耳茶壺山步道)
spots.description: A challenging hike rewarding you with a panoramic view of the Yin-Yang Sea and the gold mining towns.

spots.name: Sandiaoling Waterfall Trail (三貂嶺瀑布群)
spots.description: A primitive forest trail accessible by train. Visit the Hegu, Motian, and Pipa Cave waterfalls.

spots.name: Beitou Thermal Valley (北投地熱谷)
spots.description: The source of Beitou's hot springs. Experience the rare Green Sulfur Spring, found only here and in Akita, Japan.

title: Metropolitan Full Experience
subTitle: 都會全體驗：美食、購物與夜生活
intro: A luxurious tour for foodies and shoppers. Visit the new LaLaport Nangang, enjoy Michelin-starred street food, and party in Xinyi District.

spots.name: Songshan Cultural Park (松山文創園區)
spots.description: A former tobacco factory turned into a design hub. Visit the Eslite Spectrum for books and crafts.

spots.name: Fuhang Soy Milk (阜杭豆漿)
spots.description: A Michelin-recommended breakfast spot. The thick clay oven roll is worth the wait.

spots.name: Taipei Performing Arts Center (台北表演藝術中心)
spots.description: Known as the 'Century Egg Tofu' building. A CNN-listed transformative architecture breaking theatrical boundaries.
